2.2. Initialisation¶

settings.init.attachAllListeners()¶

Attaches event listeners to all DOM objects.

Invokes
settings.badgeConfigMenuShow(), settings.event.passVisToggle(), settings.event.confirmPassVisToggle(), settings.profileInputsCheck(), settings.accountInputsCheck(), settings.notificationsInputsCheck(), settings.backend.profileSave(), settings.profileCancel(), settings.event.profileCancelMobile(), settings.backend.accountSave(), settings.accountCancel(), settings.event.accountCancelMobile(), settings.backend.notificationsSave(), settings.notificationsCancel(), settings.event.notificationsCancelMobile(), settings.event.badgeConfigMenuSave(), settings.event.badgeConfigMenuCancel(), settings.event.badgeConfigMenuEscape(), settings.event.sectionClick(), settings.event.sectionCancelMobile()
Invoked by
settings.init.init()
settings.init.cacheInit(data)¶

Initialises the cache with user data.

Invoked by
settings.init.init()
settings.init.init()¶

Gets called on DOM load and initialises the Settings page. User data is fetched from backend to populate the page with relevant markup. Event listeners are attached and user data is cached. Session storage is checked for any references from the previous page.

Invokes
settings.backend.fetch(), settings.init.loadBadges(), settings.init.populate(), settings.init.attachAllListeners(), settings.init.sortableJSInit(), settings.init.cacheInit(), settings.init.sessionStorageCheck()
settings.init.loadBadges()¶

Creates the badge elements in preview (Profile container) and on the badge configuration menu. Badges in preview are created in the order of the user-set configuration. Badges on the configuration menu are separated by achievement into the relevant containers. The badges that have been achieved are again sorted by the previous set configuration. Event listeners for the badges are also attached here.

Invokes
settings.event.badgeConfigToggle()
Invoked by
settings.init.init()
settings.init.populate(account, user, notification)¶

Populates input fields with user settings.

Invoked by
settings.init.init()
Arguments

  • account (Object) – User account settings.

  • user (Object) – User profile settings.

  • notification (Object) – User notification settings.

settings.init.sessionStorageCheck()¶

Checks sessionStorage for references from previous page and styles the page accordingly; storage is cleared after.

Invokes
settings.badgeConfigMenuShow()
Invoked by
settings.init.init()
settings.init.sortableJSInit()¶

Initialises the SortableJS for drag and drop functionality on the badge configuration menu.

Invoked by
settings.init.init()

See also

Sortable is a lightweight JavaScript library for reorderable drag-and-drop lists.
